name: Rogue Rampage
description:
Smash your way through this one button rogue lite. Only, you can only safely smash the creatures the same colour as you. At least, until next turn...

Rogue Rampage! Made for the One Button Jam - Two Colours theme.

Controls

Point where you want to go, hold your mouse primary button to build up your charge, then release to attack.

Credits

Uses the kenney.nl microroguelike pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/micro-roguelike & some of the sound fx from their various SFX packs.
